infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app uses tracking to provide personalized running insights and improve your experience.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to track your running activities and show nearby races.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library to let you upload profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need camera access to let you take profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: We need motion data to track your running activities.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: We need access to your health data to sync your running activities.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: We need to update your health data with your running activities.

appStoreMetadata.description:
The corporate running league where everyone can win.

Connect Strava, get your personalized score, and compete fairly with colleagues from beginner to elite. PTO Corporate Running League rewards progress, not just pace.

Your Score, Your Level
Our scoring system analyzes your Strava data to create a personalized baseline. You compete against your own potential, not against the office marathon runner. Progress and consistency matter more than raw speed.

Key Features:
• Browse and register for eligible races
• Track your score evolution and rankings in real-time
• Connect Strava for automatic activity sync
• Compete for individual prizes
• Win company awards with your team
• Get race reminders and ranking updates via push notifications
• Share your achievements on social media

Stronger Teams Through Movement
The league transforms running into shared competition. Team rankings, individual prizes, and company awards create coffee break conversations at the office. Connect across departments because you're competing together, not just running at the same time.

Prizes Worth Racing For
Individual and company awards to reward progress, performance, and commitment. Winners are honored at our end-of-season celebration. Bragging rights guaranteed.

Join the PTO Corporate Running League and make running a team sport at your workplace!

Note: Your company must be a PTO member to participate.
appStoreMetadata.promotionalText: The corporate running league where everyone can win. Connect Strava, get your personalized score, and compete fairly with colleagues from beginner to elite.

reviewDetails.demoAccountPassword: Create a demo account during signup
reviewDetails.notes:
This app is a WebView-based participant app for PTO Corporate Running League.
It integrates with our web platform at https://publictimeoff.com.

Test Account:
Email: test@publictimeoff.com
Password: (password you've created)

Key features to test:
- Login via WebView
- View dashboard and rankings
- Register for events
- Receive push notifications
- Strava OAuth integration
